thread.title: Marvel just dropped the latest trailer for 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' and it looks incredible
thread.title_full: Marvel just dropped the latest trailer for 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' and it looks incredible

author: Matthew Stuart
title: Marvel just dropped the latest trailer for 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' and it looks incredible
text:
embed 
Marvel just showed off the newest trailer for "Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2" and it looks amazing. The movie will see the return of Star-Lord and the rest of the Guardians, along with a few new faces. It's scheduled to hit U.S. theaters May 5th.
